name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 116
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, For 2022! What a year, there was good, bad, and ugly, but onward and upward. Here's to a great 2022. Thanks to everyone who has joined me on my journey!
